+// Personalized Learning Engine for LearnQuest%0D%0A// Provides recommendations, learning paths, and adaptive difficulty based on user performance%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Generate personalized learning recommendations based on user performance data%0D%0A * @param %7BObject%7D db - Firestore database instance%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D userId - User ID%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D subject - Subject to generate recommendations for (optional)%0D%0A * @returns %7BPromise%3CObject%3E%7D - Personalized recommendations%0D%0A */%0D%0Aexport async function generatePersonalizedRecommendations(db, userId, subject = null) %7B%0D%0A try %7B%0D%0A // Get user performance data%0D%0A const performanceData = await getUserPerformanceData(db, userId, subject);%0D%0A if (!performanceData %7C%7C performanceData.length === 0) %7B%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A success: false,%0D%0A message: 'Not enough performance data to generate recommendations',%0D%0A recommendations: %5B%5D%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%0D%0A // Get user knowledge maps%0D%0A const knowledgeMaps = await getUserKnowledgeMaps(db, userId, subject);%0D%0A %0D%0A // Generate recommendations based on performance and knowledge maps%0D%0A const recommendations = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A // 1. Identify knowledge gaps (concepts with low mastery)%0D%0A const knowledgeGaps = identifyKnowledgeGaps(knowledgeMaps);%0D%0A if (knowledgeGaps.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'knowledge_gap',%0D%0A priority: 'high',%0D%0A title: 'Focus on these concepts',%0D%0A description: 'These concepts need more attention based on your recent performance',%0D%0A items: knowledgeGaps.slice(0, 3).map(gap =%3E (%7B%0D%0A concept: gap.concept,%0D%0A subject: gap.subject,%0D%0A mastery: gap.mastery,%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Practice more $%7Bgap.concept%7D questions in $%7Bgap.subject%7D%60%0D%0A %7D))%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // 2. Identify strengths (concepts with high mastery)%0D%0A const strengths = identifyStrengths(knowledgeMaps);%0D%0A if (strengths.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'strength',%0D%0A priority: 'medium',%0D%0A title: 'Your strengths',%0D%0A description: 'You%5C're doing well in these areas',%0D%0A items: strengths.slice(0, 3).map(strength =%3E (%7B%0D%0A concept: strength.concept,%0D%0A subject: strength.subject,%0D%0A mastery: strength.mastery,%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Try more advanced $%7Bstrength.concept%7D questions in $%7Bstrength.subject%7D%60%0D%0A %7D))%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // 3. Recommend subjects that need improvement%0D%0A const subjectsToImprove = identifySubjectsToImprove(performanceData);%0D%0A if (subjectsToImprove.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'subject_improvement',%0D%0A priority: 'medium',%0D%0A title: 'Subjects to focus on',%0D%0A description: 'These subjects need more attention',%0D%0A items: subjectsToImprove.slice(0, 3).map(subj =%3E (%7B%0D%0A subject: subj.subject,%0D%0A accuracy: subj.accuracy,%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Spend more time on $%7Bsubj.subject%7D to improve your understanding%60%0D%0A %7D))%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // 4. Learning streak recommendations%0D%0A const streakRecommendation = generateStreakRecommendation(performanceData);%0D%0A if (streakRecommendation) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(streakRecommendation);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // 5. Difficulty adjustment recommendations%0D%0A const difficultyRecommendations = generateDifficultyRecommendations(performanceData, knowledgeMaps);%0D%0A if (difficultyRecommendations.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'difficulty_adjustment',%0D%0A priority: 'medium',%0D%0A title: 'Challenge yourself',%0D%0A description: 'Based on your performance, we recommend adjusting difficulty levels',%0D%0A items: difficultyRecommendations.slice(0, 3)%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // 6. Generate personalized action plan%0D%0A const actionPlan = generateActionPlan(performanceData, knowledgeMaps, recommendations);%0D%0A %0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A success: true,%0D%0A recommendations,%0D%0A actionPlan,%0D%0A generatedAt: new Date()%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D catch (error) %7B%0D%0A console.error('Error generating personalized recommendations:', error);%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A success: false,%0D%0A message: 'Failed to generate recommendations',%0D%0A error: error.message%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Get user performance data across all subjects or for a specific subject%0D%0A * @param %7BObject%7D db - Firestore database instance%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D userId - User ID%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D subject - Subject to filter by (optional)%0D%0A * @returns %7BPromise%3CArray%3E%7D - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Aasync function getUserPerformanceData(db, userId, subject = null) %7B%0D%0A try %7B%0D%0A let query = db.collection('user_performance').where('userId', '==', userId);%0D%0A %0D%0A if (subject) %7B%0D%0A query = query.where('subject', '==', subject);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A const snapshot = await query.get();%0D%0A return snapshot.docs.map(doc =%3E doc.data());%0D%0A %7D catch (error) %7B%0D%0A console.error('Error fetching user performance data:', error);%0D%0A return %5B%5D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Get user knowledge maps across all subjects or for a specific subject%0D%0A * @param %7BObject%7D db - Firestore database instance%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D userId - User ID%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D subject - Subject to filter by (optional)%0D%0A * @returns %7BPromise%3CArray%3E%7D - Array of knowledge map objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Aasync function getUserKnowledgeMaps(db, userId, subject = null) %7B%0D%0A try %7B%0D%0A let query = db.collection('user_knowledge_maps').where('userId', '==', userId);%0D%0A %0D%0A if (subject) %7B%0D%0A query = query.where('subject', '==', subject);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A const snapshot = await query.get();%0D%0A return snapshot.docs.map(doc =%3E doc.data());%0D%0A %7D catch (error) %7B%0D%0A console.error('Error fetching user knowledge maps:', error);%0D%0A return %5B%5D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Identify knowledge gaps from knowledge maps%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D knowledgeMaps - Array of knowledge map objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BArray%7D - Array of knowledge gap objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction identifyKnowledgeGaps(knowledgeMaps) %7B%0D%0A const gaps = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A knowledgeMaps.forEach(map =%3E %7B%0D%0A const subject = map.subject;%0D%0A %0D%0A if (map.concepts) %7B%0D%0A Object.entries(map.concepts).forEach((%5Bconcept, data%5D) =%3E %7B%0D%0A // Consider concepts with mastery below 40%25 as gaps%0D%0A if (data.mastery %3C 40) %7B%0D%0A gaps.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A concept,%0D%0A mastery: data.mastery,%0D%0A complexity: data.complexity,%0D%0A lastInteractionAt: data.lastInteractionAt%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A // Sort by mastery (ascending) and recency (descending)%0D%0A return gaps.sort((a, b) =%3E %7B%0D%0A // First sort by mastery (lowest first)%0D%0A if (a.mastery !== b.mastery) %7B%0D%0A return a.mastery - b.mastery;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Then by recency (most recent first)%0D%0A const timeA = a.lastInteractionAt instanceof Date ? a.lastInteractionAt : new Date(a.lastInteractionAt);%0D%0A const timeB = b.lastInteractionAt instanceof Date ? b.lastInteractionAt : new Date(b.lastInteractionAt);%0D%0A return timeB - timeA;%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Identify strengths from knowledge maps%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D knowledgeMaps - Array of knowledge map objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BArray%7D - Array of strength objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction identifyStrengths(knowledgeMaps) %7B%0D%0A const strengths = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A knowledgeMaps.forEach(map =%3E %7B%0D%0A const subject = map.subject;%0D%0A %0D%0A if (map.concepts) %7B%0D%0A Object.entries(map.concepts).forEach((%5Bconcept, data%5D) =%3E %7B%0D%0A // Consider concepts with mastery above 75%25 as strengths%0D%0A if (data.mastery %3E 75) %7B%0D%0A strengths.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A concept,%0D%0A mastery: data.mastery,%0D%0A complexity: data.complexity,%0D%0A totalInteractions: data.totalInteractions%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A // Sort by mastery (descending) and interaction count (descending)%0D%0A return strengths.sort((a, b) =%3E %7B%0D%0A // First sort by mastery (highest first)%0D%0A if (a.mastery !== b.mastery) %7B%0D%0A return b.mastery - a.mastery;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Then by interaction count (highest first)%0D%0A return b.totalInteractions - a.totalInteractions;%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Identify subjects that need improvement%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D performanceData - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BArray%7D - Array of subject improvement objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction identifySubjectsToImprove(performanceData) %7B%0D%0A // Filter subjects with accuracy below 70%25 or progress below 50%25%0D%0A const subjectsToImprove = performanceData%0D%0A .filter(data =%3E data.averageAccuracy %3C 70 %7C%7C data.progress %3C 50)%0D%0A .map(data =%3E (%7B%0D%0A subject: data.subject,%0D%0A accuracy: data.averageAccuracy,%0D%0A progress: data.progress,%0D%0A status: data.status,%0D%0A totalInteractions: data.totalInteractions%0D%0A %7D));%0D%0A %0D%0A // Sort by accuracy (ascending)%0D%0A return subjectsToImprove.sort((a, b) =%3E a.accuracy - b.accuracy);%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Generate streak recommendation based on performance data%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D performanceData - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BObject%7Cnull%7D - Streak recommendation object or null%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction generateStreakRecommendation(performanceData) %7B%0D%0A // Find the subject with the highest streak%0D%0A let maxStreak = 0;%0D%0A let maxStreakSubject = null;%0D%0A %0D%0A performanceData.forEach(data =%3E %7B%0D%0A const streak = data.streakDays %7C%7C 0;%0D%0A if (streak %3E maxStreak) %7B%0D%0A maxStreak = streak;%0D%0A maxStreakSubject = data.subject;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A if (maxStreak === 0) %7B%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A type: 'streak',%0D%0A priority: 'low',%0D%0A title: 'Start a learning streak',%0D%0A description: 'Regular practice helps build knowledge',%0D%0A items: %5B%7B%0D%0A suggestedAction: 'Try to practice every day to build a learning streak'%0D%0A %7D%5D%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D else if (maxStreak === 1) %7B%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A type: 'streak',%0D%0A priority: 'low',%0D%0A title: 'Continue your streak',%0D%0A description: 'You%5C've started a streak! Keep it going.',%0D%0A items: %5B%7B%0D%0A subject: maxStreakSubject,%0D%0A streak: maxStreak,%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Come back tomorrow to continue your $%7BmaxStreakSubject%7D streak%60%0D%0A %7D%5D%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D else %7B%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A type: 'streak',%0D%0A priority: 'low',%0D%0A title: 'Maintain your streak',%0D%0A description: %60You're on a $%7BmaxStreak%7D-day streak in $%7BmaxStreakSubject%7D!%60,%0D%0A items: %5B%7B%0D%0A subject: maxStreakSubject,%0D%0A streak: maxStreak,%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Keep your $%7BmaxStreak%7D-day streak going by practicing $%7BmaxStreakSubject%7D again tomorrow%60%0D%0A %7D%5D%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Generate difficulty adjustment recommendations%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D performanceData - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D knowledgeMaps - Array of knowledge map objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BArray%7D - Array of difficulty recommendation objects%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction generateDifficultyRecommendations(performanceData, knowledgeMaps) %7B%0D%0A const recommendations = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A performanceData.forEach(data =%3E %7B%0D%0A const subject = data.subject;%0D%0A const accuracy = data.averageAccuracy;%0D%0A %0D%0A // Check accuracy by complexity if available%0D%0A if (data.accuracyByComplexity) %7B%0D%0A const %7B easy, medium, hard %7D = data.accuracyByComplexity;%0D%0A %0D%0A // If easy questions are consistently correct, suggest medium%0D%0A if (easy !== null && easy %3E 85 && data.interactionsByComplexity?.easy %3E 5) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A currentDifficulty: 'easy',%0D%0A suggestedDifficulty: 'medium',%0D%0A reason: 'You%5C're doing well with easy questions',%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Try more medium difficulty $%7Bsubject%7D questions to challenge yourself%60%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // If medium questions are consistently correct, suggest hard%0D%0A if (medium !== null && medium %3E 80 && data.interactionsByComplexity?.medium %3E 5) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A currentDifficulty: 'medium',%0D%0A suggestedDifficulty: 'hard',%0D%0A reason: 'You%5C're mastering medium difficulty questions',%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Challenge yourself with hard $%7Bsubject%7D questions%60%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // If hard questions are too difficult, suggest medium%0D%0A if (hard !== null && hard %3C 40 && data.interactionsByComplexity?.hard %3E 3) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A currentDifficulty: 'hard',%0D%0A suggestedDifficulty: 'medium',%0D%0A reason: 'Hard questions seem challenging right now',%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Focus on medium difficulty $%7Bsubject%7D questions to build confidence%60%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D else %7B%0D%0A // General difficulty recommendation based on overall accuracy%0D%0A if (accuracy %3E 85) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A currentDifficulty: 'current',%0D%0A suggestedDifficulty: 'higher',%0D%0A reason: 'Your accuracy is excellent',%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Try more challenging $%7Bsubject%7D questions%60%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D else if (accuracy %3C 40) %7B%0D%0A recommendations.push(%7B%0D%0A subject,%0D%0A currentDifficulty: 'current',%0D%0A suggestedDifficulty: 'lower',%0D%0A reason: 'You might benefit from easier questions',%0D%0A suggestedAction: %60Try some easier $%7Bsubject%7D questions to build confidence%60%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A return recommendations;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Generate personalized action plan based on all data%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D performanceData - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D knowledgeMaps - Array of knowledge map objects%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D recommendations - Array of recommendation objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BObject%7D - Personalized action plan%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction generateActionPlan(performanceData, knowledgeMaps, recommendations) %7B%0D%0A // Determine focus areas based on recommendations%0D%0A const focusAreas = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add knowledge gaps as focus areas%0D%0A const knowledgeGapRec = recommendations.find(r =%3E r.type === 'knowledge_gap');%0D%0A if (knowledgeGapRec && knowledgeGapRec.items.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A knowledgeGapRec.items.forEach(item =%3E %7B%0D%0A focusAreas.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'concept',%0D%0A subject: item.subject,%0D%0A target: item.concept,%0D%0A priority: 'high',%0D%0A action: item.suggestedAction%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add subjects to improve as focus areas%0D%0A const subjectRec = recommendations.find(r =%3E r.type === 'subject_improvement');%0D%0A if (subjectRec && subjectRec.items.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A subjectRec.items.forEach(item =%3E %7B%0D%0A focusAreas.push(%7B%0D%0A type: 'subject',%0D%0A subject: item.subject,%0D%0A target: 'overall_improvement',%0D%0A priority: 'medium',%0D%0A action: item.suggestedAction%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Create daily and weekly goals%0D%0A const dailyGoals = %5B%5D;%0D%0A const weeklyGoals = %5B%5D;%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add daily goals based on focus areas%0D%0A if (focusAreas.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A // Take top 2 focus areas for daily goals%0D%0A focusAreas.slice(0, 2).forEach(area =%3E %7B%0D%0A dailyGoals.push(%7B%0D%0A description: area.action,%0D%0A type: area.type,%0D%0A subject: area.subject,%0D%0A target: area.target%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add streak maintenance as a daily goal%0D%0A const streakRec = recommendations.find(r =%3E r.type === 'streak');%0D%0A if (streakRec && streakRec.items.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A dailyGoals.push(%7B%0D%0A description: streakRec.items%5B0%5D.suggestedAction,%0D%0A type: 'streak',%0D%0A subject: streakRec.items%5B0%5D.subject,%0D%0A target: 'streak_maintenance'%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add weekly goals%0D%0A // Include all focus areas for weekly goals%0D%0A focusAreas.forEach(area =%3E %7B%0D%0A weeklyGoals.push(%7B%0D%0A description: %60Improve your understanding of $%7Barea.target%7D in $%7Barea.subject%7D%60,%0D%0A type: area.type,%0D%0A subject: area.subject,%0D%0A target: area.target%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A // Add difficulty adjustments as weekly goals%0D%0A const difficultyRec = recommendations.find(r =%3E r.type === 'difficulty_adjustment');%0D%0A if (difficultyRec && difficultyRec.items.length %3E 0) %7B%0D%0A difficultyRec.items.forEach(item =%3E %7B%0D%0A weeklyGoals.push(%7B%0D%0A description: item.suggestedAction,%0D%0A type: 'difficulty',%0D%0A subject: item.subject,%0D%0A target: 'difficulty_adjustment'%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Create the action plan%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A focusAreas,%0D%0A dailyGoals,%0D%0A weeklyGoals,%0D%0A estimatedCompletionTime: calculateEstimatedCompletionTime(focusAreas),%0D%0A adaptiveLevel: calculateAdaptiveLevel(performanceData),%0D%0A generatedAt: new Date()%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Calculate estimated completion time for focus areas%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D focusAreas - Array of focus area objects%0D%0A * @returns %7BObject%7D - Estimated completion time in minutes%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction calculateEstimatedCompletionTime(focusAreas) %7B%0D%0A // Base time per focus area%0D%0A const baseTimePerArea = 15; // minutes%0D%0A %0D%0A // Calculate total time based on number and priority of focus areas%0D%0A let totalMinutes = 0;%0D%0A %0D%0A focusAreas.forEach(area =%3E %7B%0D%0A let areaTime = baseTimePerArea;%0D%0A %0D%0A // Adjust time based on priority%0D%0A if (area.priority === 'high') %7B%0D%0A areaTime *= 1.5;%0D%0A %7D else if (area.priority === 'low') %7B%0D%0A areaTime *= 0.7;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A totalMinutes += areaTime;%0D%0A %7D);%0D%0A %0D%0A // Cap at reasonable daily study time%0D%0A totalMinutes = Math.min(totalMinutes, 120);%0D%0A %0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A daily: Math.round(totalMinutes),%0D%0A weekly: Math.round(totalMinutes * 5) // Assume 5 days of study per week%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Calculate adaptive difficulty level based on performance%0D%0A * @param %7BArray%7D performanceData - Array of performance data objects%0D%0A * @returns %7Bstring%7D - Adaptive difficulty level%0D%0A */%0D%0Afunction calculateAdaptiveLevel(performanceData) %7B%0D%0A if (!performanceData %7C%7C performanceData.length === 0) %7B%0D%0A return 'beginner';%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Calculate average accuracy across all subjects%0D%0A const totalAccuracy = performanceData.reduce((sum, data) =%3E sum + data.averageAccuracy, 0);%0D%0A const averageAccuracy = totalAccuracy / performanceData.length;%0D%0A %0D%0A // Determine level based on accuracy%0D%0A if (averageAccuracy %3E= 85) %7B%0D%0A return 'advanced';%0D%0A %7D else if (averageAccuracy %3E= 65) %7B%0D%0A return 'intermediate';%0D%0A %7D else %7B%0D%0A return 'beginner';%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A%7D%0D%0A%0D%0A/**%0D%0A * Get personalized learning path for a specific subject%0D%0A * @param %7BObject%7D db - Firestore database instance%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D userId - User ID%0D%0A * @param %7Bstring%7D subject - Subject to generate learning path for%0D%0A * @returns %7BPromise%3CObject%3E%7D - Personalized learning path%0D%0A */%0D%0Aexport async function getPersonalizedLearningPath(db, userId, subject) %7B%0D%0A try %7B%0D%0A // Get user performance data for the subject%0D%0A const performanceData = await getUserPerformanceData(db, userId, subject);%0D%0A if (!performanceData %7C%7C performanceData.length === 0) %7B%0D%0A return %7B%0D%0A success: false,%0D%0A message: 'Not enough performance data to generate learning path',%0D%0A learningPath: null%0D%0A %7D;%0D%0A %7D%0D%0A %0D%0A // Get user knowledge map for the subject%0D%0A const knowledgeMaps = await getUserKnowledgeMaps(db, userId, subject);%0D%0A const
